member.summary: Gets or sets the base color for the circles.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if the animation should start automatically.

member.summary: Gets or sets the animation speed.

member.summary: Gets or sets the number of circles used in the animation.

member.summary: Gets or sets the number of circles used in the animation.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if the rotation should be clockwise or counter-clockwise.

member.summary: Gets or sets the percentage to show on the control.

member.name: P:ProgressControls.ProgressIndicator.ShowPercentage
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if the percentage value should be shown.

member.name: P:ProgressControls.ProgressIndicator.ShowText
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating if the control text should be shown.

member.name: P:ProgressControls.ProgressIndicator.TextDisplay
member.summary: Gets or sets the property that will be shown in the control.

member.name: T:ProgressControls.RotationType
member.summary: An enum used to indicate the rotational direction of the control.

member.name: F:ProgressControls.RotationType.Clockwise
member.summary: Indicates that the rotation should move clockwise.

member.name: F:ProgressControls.RotationType.CounterClockwise
member.summary: Indicates that the rotation should move counter-clockwise.

member.name: T:ProgressControls.TextDisplayModes
member.summary: This enum is used to choose what text should be shown in the control.

member.name: F:ProgressControls.TextDisplayModes.None
member.summary: No text will be shown by the control.

member.name: F:ProgressControls.TextDisplayModes.Percentage
member.summary: The control will show the value of the Percentage property.

member.name: F:ProgressControls.TextDisplayModes.Text
member.summary: The control will show the value of the Text property.

member.name: F:ProgressControls.TextDisplayModes.Both
member.summary: The control will show the values of the Text and Percentage properties.
